meanings.definition: A person who is excessively fussy or particular about small details.
meanings.sent1: My aunt is a fusspots when it comes to arranging flowers in the vase.
meanings.sent2: The fusspots at the event complained about the temperature of the room.
meanings.sent3: The fusspots in the office always rearrange the pens on their desk.
meanings.sent4: She's a fusspots when it comes to organizing her bookshelf, everything must be in perfect order.
meanings.sent5: The fusspots noticed the tiniest scratch on the new furniture.
